paragraphs.body: The screeching bird is a small, fluffy white ${link_0} that can be found in the ${link_1} in the southern ${link_2}. It is known for its ominous scream.
paragraphs.text: The screeching bird is a small, fluffy white bird that can be found in the Foggy Swamp in the southern Earth Kingdom. It is known for its ominous scream.

paragraphs.body: While walking through the mysterious Foggy Swamp, ${link_0}, ${link_1}, and ${link_2} stopped to make camp. As Sokka tried to convince the group that it was just a normal swamp, a nearby screech from this bird frightened them, and they huddled together to quell each other's fear.
paragraphs.text: While walking through the mysterious Foggy Swamp, Aang, Katara, and Sokka stopped to make camp. As Sokka tried to convince the group that it was just a normal swamp, a nearby screech from this bird frightened them, and they huddled together to quell each other's fear.

paragraphs.body: Later, when ${link_0} was having dinner, another screeching bird landed nearby and, after letting out its awful scream, was swatted away by a tree root.
paragraphs.text: Later, when Team Avatar was having dinner, another screeching bird landed nearby and, after letting out its awful scream, was swatted away by a tree root.

paragraphs.body: The screeching bird has fluffy white or light gray feathers covering its body. Its eyes and beak are almost hidden by its pudgy face; the eyes appear beady and dark beneath the head feathers. Though its beak appears tiny when closed, it can open wide to emit a loud shriek that sounds like a woman screaming.
paragraphs.text: The screeching bird has fluffy white or light gray feathers covering its body. Its eyes and beak are almost hidden by its pudgy face; the eyes appear beady and dark beneath the head feathers. Though its beak appears tiny when closed, it can open wide to emit a loud shriek that sounds like a woman screaming.

paragraphs.body: The screeching bird's distinct vocalizations resemble the screeches made by common barn owls, which are alternatively known as screech owls due to their distinctive screams.
paragraphs.text: The screeching bird's distinct vocalizations resemble the screeches made by common barn owls, which are alternatively known as screech owls due to their distinctive screams.
